data.name: NutriScience Innovations
data.description: NutriScience Innovations (NSI) is a leading global supplier of high-quality nutritional and functional food ingredients. Our focus is to serve our customers in the Nutritional & Dietary Supplement, Nutraceutical, Functional Food & Beverage, Personal Care and Cosmetic Industries by providing the highest-quality ingredients & materials with outstanding technical and customer service. Founded in 1993, NSI has established itself as a leader in providing exceptional access to an assortment of leading specialty products. Furthermore, the company has a specialty in helping customers with difficult-to-find ingredients & materials, and partners with the R&D/Innovation teams of its customers to help develop new and exciting products for consumers. Additionally, FabriChem, a Division of NutriScience Innovations, helps industrial manufacturers with their material and specialty chemical needs. Combined, NSI and Fabrichem have established relationships with over 5,000 manufacturers worldwide to date.

data.name: ElastaGLO (Hydrolyzed Elastin)
data.description: ElastaGLO® is a fermented, hydrolyzed elastin from the connective tissue of the bonito fish. ElastaGLO® contains Desmosine and Isodesmosine. These are cross-linking molecules that are only found in elastin and give elastin its unique properties.

data.name: XanMax (Lutein - Zeaxanthin)
data.description: XanMax® is a portfolio of free lutein:zeaxanthin ingredients created for optimal eye health and healthy aging. XanMax® is extracted and purified from marigold flowers, Tagetes erecta. XanMax® represents a comprehensive range of Lutein and Zeaxanthin extracted from marigold that delivers high quality at a competitive price point. XanMax® is ideal for a quality-focused brand that wants to deliver superior eye products at competitive prices to its customers.

data.name: ButyraGen (Direct Butyrate Generator)
data.description: ButyraGen™ is an innovative, next-generation prebiotic – it is a direct butyrate generator for gut health and beyond, generating high levels of butyrate directly in the colon. Butyrate is a key short-chain fatty acid (SCFA) postbiotic that has been shown to be a critical signaling molecule for improving gut health and for gut-related effects on other organs via the gut-brain axis. ButyraGen™ has the unique ability to generate butyrate mostly independent of the state of the microbiome, delivering benefits to a wide variety of people. ButyraGen™ delivers benefits as a stand-alone, low-dose prebiotic, or in combination with probiotics to further enhance the health benefits across multiple gut-organ axes.Benefits: Gut Health, Prebiotic, Brain and Nervous Systems Support, Immunity, Inflammation, Mood and Sleep, Cardiovascular Health, Metabolic Syndrome, Thermogenesis, Oxidative Stress, Anti-Aging, Skin Health, Liver Health, Lung Health, Overall Health, Cognitive Health, AntioxidantApplications: Dietary Supplements, Functional Foods & Beverages, Animal Health

data.name: Shoden Ashwagandha
data.description: Shoden® is an innovative, clinically proven, high potency extract from the leaves and roots of the Ashwagandha plant. With an industry-leading 35% Withanolide Glycosides (as measured by HPLC), Shoden® offers high bioavailability and demonstrated activity even at low doses. Shoden® has been clinically studied for anxiety, stress, sleep-related conditions, vitality, testosterone in men, Beauty from Within, and immunity.Ashwagandha, Withania somnifera, is an adaptogen. Adaptogens mimic the body’s own stress-reducing hormones and increase the body’s ability to recover from stress while creating an overall feeling of balance and normalization. Shoden® is the perfect ingredient for the “new normal” where emotional wellbeing has become a primary concern.Sustainability and traceability are important. Shoden® Ashwagandha has a great story of sustainable farming and supporting the communities surrounding the farms. Read this wonderful article about where NutriScience’s Shoden® comes from.Benefits: Sleep Quality, Sports Performance, Testosterone, Vitality, Immune Health, Mood Support, Stress Reduction, Cognitive Health, Fatigue, Beauty from Within, Energy & Focus, Men’s Health, Calming & SleepApplications: Dietary Supplements, Functional Foods & Beverages, Animal Health, Sleep Support Products, Stress Support Products, Immune Health Support Products, Sports & Performance Nutrition Products, Creams & Topicals

data.name: NutriGP
data.description: NutriGP®, a portfolio of five mineral Glycerophosphates for use in a variety of nutritional applications, including dietary ingredients, sports nutrition, ketogenic formulas, functional foods and beverages fortification, oral care and animal health products. The NutriGP® mineral Glycerophosphate line includes Calcium, Magnesium, Manganese, Potassium and Sodium.

data.name: Eldermune (65:1 Elderberry Concentrate)
data.description: Eldermune® is an innovative new product containing elderberry juice concentrate combined with Sunfiber® (partially hydrolyzed guar fiber) as a soluble fiber. This synergistic combination of Elderberry for immune support and Sunfiber®, a prebiotic dietary fiber, improves digestibility and helps with the absorption of the elderberry nutrients. Additionally, Eldermune® has a demonstrated prebiotic effect, and is suitable for use as a low dose prebiotic, due to its industry-leading high polyphenol content.The elderberry concentrate in Eldermune® has a high concentration ratio of 65:1 (65 grams of pure elderberry fruit makes 1 gram of the elderberry concentrate).Organic options available. Benefits: Immune Health, Digestive Health, Prebiotic, Antioxidant, Microbiome Support, Gut Health, Gut pHApplications: Dietary Supplements, Functional Foods & Beverages, Animal Health

data.name: InoPhyte
data.description: InoPhyte® has been found to regulate cellular functions including cell differentiation and proliferation. Additionally, studies have shown that Inositol Hexaphosphate/IP6 can be an effective tool to support the strength of the immune system. Due to its enormous chelating power, InoPhyte® can be used in a wide range of food applications.

data.name: OptiLut (Lutein)
data.description: OptiLut® is a portfolio of lutein esters created for optimal eye health and healthy aging. OptiLut® supports macular health and may help to improve visual performance with prolonged screen use in healthy individuals.

data.name: KeraGLO (Hydrolyzed Keratin)
data.description: KeraGLO® Hydrolyzed Keratin is from poultry feathers and is extensively hydrolyzed to improve absorption. Other forms of hydrolyzed keratin are only partially hydrolyzed and are poorly absorbed and thus may be of limited benefit when used in Beauty from Within products.

data.name: InoPhyte® Calcium Magnesium Phytate (Inositol Hexaphosphate/IP6)
data.description: InoPhyte® Calcium Magnesium Phytate (Inositol Hexaphosphate/IP6) is a natural antioxidant. It is a sugar molecule with six attached phosphates and is made via a proprietary process from rice bran. Calcium Magnesium Phytate is one of the organophosphoric esters that occurs naturally in rice bran with an average of 9.5 - 10.5 % compared with other plant seeds that normally contain 0.6 - 3.6 %.

data.name: KeraGLO® Hydrolyzed Keratin (Food Grade)
data.description: KeraGLO® Hydrolyzed Keratin (Food Grade) Hydrolyzed keratin is keratin protein that has been broken down into smaller molecules and is readily absorbed in the body when consumed orally. Keratin is a structural protein that connects epithelial (skin) cells together and protects them from environmental damage. However, keratin itself is insoluble and is poorly absorbed in the body.

data.name: ElastaGLO® Hydrolyzed Elastin
data.description: ElastaGLO® Hydrolyzed Elastin is a highly elastic protein in the connective tissue which allows skin to return to its original position when stretched. Collagen is the main component of skin; elastin holds the collagen bundles together and gives skin its elasticity. Aging causes elastin production to slow down, therefore skin loses elasticity and wrinkles begin to form. Elastin helps restore the elasticity of skin. Hydrolyzed elastin has been shown to provide additional benefits, including improvements in vascular elasticity and blood flow. It supports joint mobility, healthy ligaments, and a healthy, non-sagging bust. Hydrolyzed elastin can also be considered for a surgical recovery product.

data.name: OptiLut® Lutein
data.description: OptiLut® lutein esters are extracted and purified from marigold flowers, Tagetes erecta. Lutein esters have been shown to be more bioavailable than free lutein. Lutein and Zeaxanthin have also been shown to benefit cognitive health in all age groups, from infants to late adulthood. The exclusive OptiLut® line offered by NutriScience Innovations represents a comprehensive range of marigold lutein ester extracts that deliver high quality at a competitive price point.

data.name: BGF-Immune® 1,3-Beta-Glucan
data.description: BGF-Immune®1,3-Beta-Glucan supports healthy immune function by working on the cells of the innate immune defense system to mobilize a complex set of immune defense mechanisms. This ultimately enhances the body's immune response to promote overall health and wellness. General research shows that immune function receptor bindings are specific to 1,3 linkages. Unlike other sources of Beta-Glucan from barley, oats, mushrooms and yeast that report a combined total of (1,3 & 1,4) or (1,3 & 1,6) Beta-Glucans, BGF-Immune® contains high purity 1,3 linkages with virtually no 1,4 or 1,6 linkages. It is the 1,3 linkage that is specifically associated with immune health.

data.name: Shoden® Ashwagandha

properties.name: Product Families
items: Formulated Feeds, Whole Foods and Extracts

data.description: ﻿Function: Stress Reduction, Sleep Quality, SupplementBenefits: Sleep Quality, Sports Performance, Testosterone, Vitality, Immune Health, Mood Support, Stress Reduction, Cognitive Health, Fatigue, Beauty from Within, Energy & Focus, Men’s Health, Calming & SleepApplications: Dietary Supplements, Functional Foods & Beverages, Animal Health, Sleep Support Products, Stress Support Products, Immune Health Support Products, Sports & Performance Nutrition Products, Creams & TopicalsShoden® Ashwagandha, Withania somnifera, is an adaptogen. Adaptogens mimic the body’s own stress-reducing hormones and increase the body’s ability to recover from stress while creating an overall feeling of balance and normalization. Shoden® is the perfect ingredient for the “new normal” where emotional wellbeing has become a primary concern. Sustainability and traceability are important. Shoden® Ashwagandha has a great story of sustainable farming and supporting the communities surrounding the farms.

data.name: SharpPS® Phosphatidyl Serine (70P)
data.description: SharpPS® Phosphatidyl Serine (70P) is a naturally occurring phospholipid that is consumed as part of a normal diet. Clinical studies indicate that supplemental phosphatidyl serine may be beneficial for memory loss conditions, cognitive performance, improving mood and learning disabilities. Phosphatidyl Serine has also been shown to improve the exercise experience, by demonstrating the ability to help with increasing the time to exhaustion, allowing for optimal utilization of training time; improving recovery following training; and also with reducing muscle soreness following training.

data.name: NutriGP® Magnesium Glycerophosphate (MGP)
data.description: NutriGP® Magnesium is a unique source of magnesium for use as a dietary ingredient, oral health (as a teeth whitener) and for magnesium fortification. It is a useful ketogenic mineral since the Glycerophosphate is involved in ketogenic pathways. NutriGP® Magnesium can also be used as a functional white coating for tablets, capsules and softgels. Mineral Glycerophosphates are bioavailable minerals which provide both Glycerophosphates and mineral content. Glycerophosphates are also involved in ketogenic and glucogenic pathways.

data.name: NutriScience Innovations Perilla Seed Extract
data.description: Perilla, Perilla frutescens, is an edible, aromatic plant with a long history of culinary and traditional medicinal use. Perilla Seed Extract contains antioxidative flavonoids as aglycons - a unique form without the usual glycosyl unit attached. The flavonoid aglycones include polyphenols such as Luteolin, Apigenin, Chrysoeriol, and Rosemarinic Acid.

data.seo_description: NutriScience Innovations (NSI) is a leading global supplier of high-quality nutritional and functional food ingredients. Our focus is to serve our customers in the Nutritional & Dietary Supplement
data.heading: A leading cGMP-certified ingredient development and supply company

data.name: NutriGP
data.html_description: NutriGP®, a portfolio of five mineral Glycerophosphates for use in a variety of nutritional applications, including dietary ingredients, sports nutrition, ketogenic formulas, functional foods and beverages fortification, oral care and animal health products. The NutriGP® mineral Glycerophosphate line includes Calcium, Magnesium, Manganese, Potassium and Sodium.
data.text_description: NutriGP®, a portfolio of five mineral Glycerophosphates for use in a variety of nutritional applications, including dietary ingredients, sports nutrition, ketogenic formulas, functional foods and beverages fortification, oral care and animal health products. The NutriGP® mineral Glycerophosphate line includes Calcium, Magnesium, Manganese, Potassium and Sodium.
data.seo_description: View all NutriScience Innovations NutriGP products on Knowde.com. Quickly and easily request a quote, get samples, and download data sheets.

data.name: NutriGP® Magnesium Glycerophosphate (MGP)
data.description: NutriGP® Magnesium is a unique source of magnesium for use as a dietary ingredient, oral health (as a teeth whitener) and for magnesium fortification. It is a useful ketogenic mineral since the Glycerophosphate is involved in ketogenic pathways. NutriGP® Magnesium can also be used as a functional white coating for tablets, capsules and softgels. Mineral Glycerophosphates are bioavailable minerals which provide both Glycerophosphates and mineral content. Glycerophosphates are also involved in ketogenic and glucogenic pathways.

data.name: NutriGP® Manganese Glycerophosphate (MnGP)
data.description: NutriGP® Manganese Glycerophosphate (MnGP) is a trace mineral, required by the body in small amounts. It aids in the normal functioning of the brain, nervous system and many of the body's enzyme systems. Mineral Glycerophosphates are bioavailable minerals which provide both Glycerophosphates and mineral content. Glycerophosphates are also involved in ketogenic and glucogenic pathways. NutriGP® Manganese is a pinkish white powder which is a bioavailable source of the micronutrient manganese.

data.name: NutriGP® Calcium Glycerophosphate (CGP)
data.description: NutriGP® Calcium Glycerophosphate (CGP) are bioavailable minerals which provide both Glycerophosphates and mineral content. Glycerophosphates are also involved in ketogenic and glucogenic pathways. NutriGP® Calcium Glycerophosphate is well suited for applications requiring calcium fortification and supplementation, including infant nutrition applications. Calcium Glycerophosphate is very bioavailable. It is an FDA approved ingredient for use as a calcium source for infant formulas. Additionally, Calcium Glycerophosphate can be used in toothpastes to inhibit the progression of plaque and reduce dental caries.

data.name: NutriGP® Potassium Glycerophosphate (PGP)
data.description: NutriGP® Potassium Glycerophosphate (PGP) is a 40% powder blended with rice flour. It is suitable for potassium fortification and as a bioavailable source of potassium when compared to potassium chloride. Mineral Glycerophosphates are bioavailable minerals which provide both Glycerophosphates and mineral content. Glycerophosphates are also involved in ketogenic and glucogenic pathways.

Our focus is to serve our customers in the Nutritional & Dietary Supplement, Nutraceutical, Functional Food & Beverage, Personal Care and Cosmetic Industries by providing the highest-quality ingredients & materials with outstanding technical and customer service. Founded in 1993, NSI has established itself as a leader in providing exceptional access to an assortment of leading specialty products. Furthermore, the company has a specialty in helping customers with difficult-to-find ingredients & materials, and partners with the R&D/Innovation teams of its customers to help develop new and exciting products for consumers. Additionally, FabriChem, a Division of NutriScience Innovations, helps industrial manufacturers with their material and specialty chemical needs. Combined, NSI and Fabrichem have established relationships with over 5,000 manufacturers worldwide to date.

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

FLAVOR_ANALYZER.HEADER: Need a flavor that’s not in our online PRIMETIME catalog?
FLAVOR_ANALYZER.DISCOVER_FLAVORS: Tap into our expansive offline portfolio of over 500,000 flavors! Our Portfolio Team can assist in identifying the perfect flavor for your needs. Tell us more about what you’re looking for.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
